turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, im sorry i can hear an echo in the background, are your headphones in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, can you please repeat your order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and did you want your dark roasted coffee iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to add any milk to your coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size did you want your coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will a tall be ok for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i order your coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered a tall dark roast coffee to be picked up in daly city, ca at westlake shopping center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, can i help with anything else?
